articles.author: Jean Leon
articles.title: OnePlus 15: Top-tier variant has a 'hidden' RAM speed boost - Notebookcheck
articles.description: The OnePlus 15 boasts top-tier specs, but a 'hidden' detail in the memory setup is easy to miss. The 16GB variant features significantly faster LPDDR5X Ultra+ RAM than the 12GB model. We dive into the technical difference behind the "Ultra" monikers and what …
articles.content: The OnePlus 15 recently arrived on the global stage, attracting attention with its massive battery and top-tier specifications. A recent tough battery test offered more details about the endurance of… [+1889 chars]
